target_markets.market_description: Entrepreneurs and business professionals seeking accelerated learning for wealth building
pain_points: Mental masturbation loop of consuming content without retention
Taking 100 years to become millionaire instead of 10
Forgetting what they learned within weeks
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Most people are on path to becoming millionaire but learning too slow

problems_validated.problem: Broken learning process - people consume content but don't retain or apply knowledge
problems_validated.severity: Critical - extends wealth-building timeline from 10 years to 100 years
problems_validated.current_solutions: Reading books, watching YouTube videos, listening to podcasts
problems_validated.market_gap: No systematic approach to fast learning with feedback loops and practical application

products_tools.name: ChatGPT
products_tools.use_case: Skill identification, learning prioritization, and self-reflection feedback

business_strategies.strategy: 10x faster learning to compress wealth-building timeline
business_strategies.implementation: Map skill trees, identify subskills, install feedback loops, teach to lock in knowledge
business_strategies.expected_results: Reduce 100-year millionaire path to 10 or 3 years
business_strategies.case_study: Speaker built and sold 3 software companies, became multi-millionaire at 28

business_strategies.strategy: Pre-sell prototype apps before full development
business_strategies.implementation: Build prototype app and pre-sell to 5 people
business_strategies.case_study: Mentioned as example of specific learning goal

problems_solutions.solution: Skill tree mapping methodology with 4 core steps
steps: Define master node with specific outcome and deadline

startup_ideas.idea: Learning acceleration platform using skill tree methodology
startup_ideas.target_market: Entrepreneurs and professionals wanting faster skill acquisition
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Broken learning processes that waste time and don't build wealth
startup_ideas.validation: High engagement on learning content, multi-generational appeal

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Learning just in case instead of just in time
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Overwhelm and inefficient use of learning time
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Focus on most important dependencies first, sequence learning
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Iron Man training - learning to swim more critical than biking

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Avoiding feedback due to fear of negative input
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing blind spots and repeating same mistakes
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Actively seek feedback from mentors and peers
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Most people don't ask for feedback because they don't want to hear negative things

mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Thinking you're unique snowflake instead of following proven blueprints
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Model existing successful approaches first, then modify once working
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Most people think their situation is unique when others have done it before

growth_tactics.tactic: Teaching methodology through storytelling and frameworks
steps: Use personal stories for each concept
growth_tactics.results_expected: Viral content that others can teach to their teams

steps: Ask AI what skills needed for specific goal
ai_workflows.use_case: Breaking down complex goals into learnable subskills

steps: Use specific prompt for blind spot identification
Get honest feedback about unique traits
ai_workflows.use_case: Identifying personal blind spots and unique strengths

metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Compare time to achieve specific outcomes
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Use skill tree mapping and feedback loops

trends_signals.opportunity: Leverage AI for personalized learning paths and feedback

actionable_quotes.quote: Learn just in time, not just in case
actionable_quotes.context: Avoiding overwhelm when breaking down skills
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus learning efforts on immediate dependencies rather than comprehensive knowledge

actionable_quotes.quote: You can't win the race in the swim, but you can definitely lose the race by not getting out of the water
actionable_quotes.context: Prioritizing critical subskills in Iron Man training
actionable_quotes.actionability: Identify and prioritize skills that can cause complete failure vs. optimization
Copy successful approaches first, customize only after achieving initial success

key_statistics.statistic: 10 times faster learning can reduce 100-year wealth path to 10 or 3 years
key_statistics.context: Impact of accelerated learning on wealth building timeline
